remarks.para: Except for ER operations beyond 120 minutes, may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Associated fan air modulation valve is secured full open, and
Aircraft is not operated in known or forecast icing conditions.
Operations into known or forecast icing conditions are prohibited.

placard.para: Placard near HI-STAGE Indicating lights located on Bleed Air Supply Module (M10259) on P5 panel "FAN MOD VALVE INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Notify Flight Dispatch. Flight planning may be affected.

warning.para: FAILURE TO FOLLOW MAINTENANCE MANUAL 78-31-100/201 COULD RESULT IN INJURY TO PERSONNEL AND/OR DAMAGE TO FAN COWL, CORE COWL AND FAN DUCT COWL AND THRUST REVERSER.

numlitem.para: Open applicable fan duct and thrust reverser cowls.

On the fan air modulating valve, depress the lock lever ensuring the pawl is disengaged. Rotate the manual override hex approximately 90º clockwise (CW) until pawl is engaged in the open detent. Verify position indicator agrees with the selected detent.
Close applicable fan duct and thrust reverser cowls.
